venue.name: The Kinsale Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description: Hello Southerners! I'm the new organizer and I can't wait to meet everyone! I apologize if this meetup seems last minute, but I really wanted to have an event before Thanksgiving. If you can't make this one, I'm planning to have another event in December so I hope to see you then! Trivia starts at 7, but its my experience with pub trivia nights that we should arrive around 6:30 to grab tables. I'll have a sign so you can easily identify the group.
item.name: Trivia @ The Kinsale in Government Center
